name: Ham and Broccoli Casserole
recipeIngredient: 12 slices white bread, crusts removed, torn into pieces
3 cups (2 10 oz pkgs) chopped frozen broccoli, thawed

recipeInstructions.text: In a 9x13x2 inch baking dish, put enough of the bread pieces into the bottom of the pan to make a thin layer. Make a layer of ham, broccoli, and cheese. Whisk together milk, eggs, salt, and dry mustard. Pour over top. Toss remaining bread with butter; sprinkle over the top of the casserole. Bake at 325F for 45 minutes. Let cool for about 20 minutes.
